name: Flow Drills
description: Developing continuous weapon movement, combat rhythm, and seamless transitions between attacks, defenses, and footwork.

workout_groups.name: Fundamentals of Combat Flow
workout_groups.description: Training to execute seamless movements with weapons while maintaining control and precision.

workouts.name: Basic Weapon Flow Sequence
workouts.description: Perform a continuous loop of basic sword, knife, and buckler movements without pausing.

workouts.name: Mirror Hand Flow Drill
workouts.description: Execute the same movements with both dominant and non-dominant hands to develop equal coordination.

workouts.name: Defensive Flow Drill
workouts.description: Move fluidly between blocks, parries, and defensive angles while keeping mobility.

workouts.name: Knife-to-Sword Transition Flow
workouts.description: Switch between knife and sword mid-combat, ensuring smooth, non-stop movement.

workout_groups.name: Weapon Switching & Adaptive Movement
workout_groups.description: Enhancing the ability to dynamically change weapons and adapt movement in a combat scenario.

workouts.name: Circular Motion Flow Drill
workouts.description: Move in circular footwork patterns while maintaining offensive strikes and defensive parries.

workouts.name: Blade-to-Buckler Transition Flow
workouts.description: Switch between offensive sword movements and defensive buckler deflections in a continuous pattern.

workouts.name: Multi-Weapon Continuous Motion Drill
workouts.description: Execute transitions between all weapons (sword, knife, wrist blade, buckler) in one fluid sequence.

workouts.name: Adaptive Combat Flow Sparring
workouts.description: React to random opponent attacks and maintain weapon flow without breaking rhythm.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Combat Flow Mastery
workout_groups.description: Training for instinctive, high-speed, and unpredictable flow techniques in full-combat scenarios.

workouts.name: Ambidextrous Combat Flow
workouts.description: Switch hands and weapons mid-strike while maintaining full control.

workouts.name: Continuous Multi-Strike Chain
workouts.description: Perform a long chain of rapid attacks using both hands without stopping.

workouts.name: Unpredictable Tempo Combat Flow
workouts.description: Vary attack speeds, switching between slow, deceptive movement and explosive bursts.

workouts.name: Live Combat Flow Sparring
workouts.description: Engage in high-speed sparring with no pre-set movements, focusing on instinctive combat flow.
